thread.title: Wow! Pacer Umesh Yadav hammers blistering ton in Ranji Trophy for Vidarbha
thread.title_full: Wow! Pacer Umesh Yadav hammers blistering ton in Ranji Trophy for Vidarbha - Sports

author: PTI
title: Wow! Pacer Umesh Yadav hammers blistering ton in Ranji Trophy for Vidarbha
text:
India pacer Umesh Yadav hammered seven sixes and as many fours on his way to an unbeaten 128 off 119 balls for Vidarbha against Odisha on day two of the Ranji Trophy game in Nagpur
Nagpur: India pacer Umesh Yadav smashed his maiden century across formats to put Vidarbha in a strong position against Odisha on day two of the Ranji Trophy Group 'A' game in Nagpur today.
Courtesy Yadav's unbeaten 128 off 119 balls, Vidarbha ended at 467 all out after resuming the day at 256 for six. Odisha in reply were 79 for two at stumps, trailing the hosts by 388 runs with Govinda Podder (21*) and Anurag Sarangi (9*) at the crease.
Vidarbha tailender Umesh Yadav celebrates his ton during Ranji Trophy match against Odisha at Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium (VCA) in Nagpur on Friday. Pic/PTI  
The star of the day undoubtedly was Yadav and this time his heroics were not with the ball. The 27-year-old, whose previous highest First Class score was 90, hammered seven sixes and as many fours in his entertaining knock.
Yadav got good support from tail-ender Akshay Wakhare, who chipped in with 34 off 90 balls.
On day one, opener Aditya Shanware struck 119 and held the innings together before being dismissed in the 88th over.
Brief scores: Vidarbha 467 in 143.4 overs (Aditya Shanware 119, Ganesh Satish 53, Umesh Yadav 128 not out; Basant Mohanty 3/65). Odisha 79/2 in 34 overs (Girija Rout 25; Ravikumar Thakur 1/11).
